name: website_basics
description:
As a customer
  i will be able 
  to see all elements of the website and 
  to use all navigation elements

steps.name: I am on the website
I should be a basic elements
I navigate to the category by the hovermenu
I should be on the categorysite
I navigate to the category by the menu
I should be on the categorysite
I click the link to my account
I should be on the accountpage
I click the link of the cart
I should see the sidebar of the product cart
I click the link to edit the cart
I should be on the page of the productcart
I click the link of help
I should see a contextmenu
I check all links for correct country

name: search
description:
As a customer
  i will be able to search for a specific product

steps.name: I am on the website
I am for an product by entering the sku in the searchfield
I should be on the detailsite of the related product

name: direct order
description:
As a customer
I want to have the opportunity to add an article to the cart, by simply opening a form and entering the sku and amount of this article

steps.name: I am on the website
I click the button for direct ordering
I send my inserted data with the form
I should see the sidebar of the product cart
I should find the article in the sidebar

name: product page
description:
As a customer,
I want to have the opportunity to use the feaatures of the product page

steps.name: I am on the product page of an article
I press the remember-button
there should see a hint
I press the compare-button
there should see the icon to compare

elements.name: add an article to the product cart by clicking button

steps.name: I add an article to the product cart by clicking the button to push it into the cart
I should see the cart on the right of the site
I should see all necessary elememts for getting more informations about this article
I change in the tab to the rating

name: account
description:
As a customer,
I want to be able to put a product into my cart
in order to manage my chosen products

steps.name: I add an article to my cart manually
output: I am on the product page of an article
I add an article to the product cart by clicking the button to push it into the cart
I am on the product cart page

steps.name: I click on the button to continue shopping
I will see the back on the productsite
the product cart contains an article
I activate the function for voucher
I enter some code into the optional field
there should be the voucher-action in the url
the product cart contains an article
I remove this article from the product cart
the cart should not contain this article
the product cart contains an article
I should see all necessary informations about this article within the product list of the product cart
the product cart contains an article
I navigate to the checkout by clicking the button which navigates to the checkout
I should be on the checkout-page
